attributes.action: Maintain the Kent & Canterbury Hospital in Canterbury.
attributes.background: The Kent & Canterbury Hospital has been systematically and regularly downgraded. Maternity & emergency  facilities are among those that have been withdrawn. There appears to be a pressure to further downgrade the site so it can be developed for profitable purposes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition on the future of the Kent and Canterbury hospital: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/187524
